message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with natural language processing and sentiment analysis of reviews. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also likely as the paper focuses on summarizing opinions on particular products. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the paper proposes two Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) based methods for aspect mapping and sentiment classification. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is a possible category as the paper uses machine learning techniques for opinion summarization. 
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a possible category as the paper proposes CNN-based methods for aspect mapping and sentiment classification.
